edu.cmu.sphinx.trainer

Interface TrainManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Configurable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleTrainManager

    public interface TrainManager
extends Configurable
    Manages inputs and outputs to the other trainer classes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PROP_MAXIMUM_ITERATION
      The maximum number of iterations.
      static java.lang.String PROP_MINIMUM_IMPROVEMENT
      The minimum relative improvement of the log likelihood associated with the training data.

        void saveModels(java.lang.String context)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the acoustic models.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of this TrainManager
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while loading the data

      • copyModels

        void copyModels(java.lang.String context)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Copy the model.

        This method copies to model set, possibly to a new location and new format. This is useful if one wants to convert from binary to ascii and vice versa, or from a directory structure to a JAR file. If only one model is used, then name can be null.

        Parameters:
        context - this TrainManager's context
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while loading the data

      • initializeModels

        void initializeModels(java.lang.String context)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Initializes the acoustic models.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of this TrainManager
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something went wrong

      • trainContextIndependentModels

        void trainContextIndependentModels(java.lang.String context)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Trains context independent models. If the initialization stage was skipped, it loads models from files, automatically.
        Parameters:
        context - the context of this train manager.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something went wrong
